text: There ’ s a big age difference between Han Solo and his best friend, Chewbacca, according to the most recent Solo : A Star Wars Story trailer. The revelatory moment occurs toward the end of the trailer, when Han and Chewie are flying the Millennium Falcon. After Han asks Chewie how he knows to fly the ship, the young smuggler gets a surprising answer. “ 190 years old? ” Han asks, translating Chewbacca ’ s response for the viewer. “ You look great! ” Based on the new information, it isn ’ t too difficult to guess Chewbacca ’ s age in Star Wars : Episode IV — A New Hope, the first time he appeared.
